author: eptwts
text:
every time i speak to a "normal" person about life, i realize how incredibly lucky we are to have stumbled upon online business & spent enough time in niche communities to get a grasp of it...

it's hard to conceptualize how alien this shit is to the average guy

sometimes you gotta take the foot off the gas pedal & reflect on it, we truly are some of the luckiest people in the world

i thank God everyday for leading me down this path & letting me provide for my family without having to break my back
